fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack someone with a particularly sharp rock. You will deal your current Attack tier to your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every time your particular sharp rock isn't lethal, it becomes particularly sharper. Your attack tier is upgraded each time you fail to kill someone, maxing out at Unstoppable.
- If you perform the factional Rock kill, it'll be upgraded to your current Attack tier plus 1 tier. In other words, you will potentially be able to deal an Overkill attack.
